user1.title: FB-hack-attack
user1.body: Hack Attack is a site with 1-on-1 challenges to learn programming and security. It was made for Bitcamp 2017, then expanded on for "Facebook with Benefits," hosted by Hackers@VT on May 2 at VT. We used a tournament-style bracket and 95+ participants competed.

default.title: See your Repository here!
default.body: Looking to get more interest in your project? Apply for a 'Feature Repository' spot today! Featured Repositories are posted here, pinned on the VT Organization Page for 10 days, and tweeted about via our twitter (@VT_GitHub_Org)!
